blogPost.title: How can data improve teaching and learning experiences? Answer by Dan Avida, CEO and Co-Founder of @engageli. https://t.co/7VXIWmRJzo https://t.co/PDiTvRIoxl
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: データはどのようにして教育・学習体験を向上させるのか？回答者：Dan Avida（@engageliのCEO兼共同創業者） https://t.co/7VXIWmRJzo https://t.co/PDiTvRIoxl
数据如何能改善教学经验？由@engageli的CEO和联合创始人Dan Avida回答。https://t.co/7VXIWmRJzo https://t.co/PDiTvRIoxl
